verses.verse: And of the blue <S%H8504><s%>, and purple <S%H713><s%>, and scarlet <S%H8144><s%>, they made <S%H6213><s%> finely wrought <S%H8278><s%> garments <S%H899><s%>, for ministering <S%H8334><s%> in the holy <S%H6944><s%> place <S%H6213><s%>, and made the holy <S%H6944><s%> garments <S%H899><s%> for Aaron <S%H175><s%>; as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.
And he made <S%H6213><s%> the ephod <S%H646><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>, blue <S%H8504><s%>, and purple <S%H713><s%>, and scarlet <S%H8438><s%>, and fine twined <S%H7806><s%> linen <S%H8336><s%>.

And they did beat <S%H7554><s%> the gold <S%H2091><s%> into <S%H854><s%> thin plates <S%H6341><s%>, and cut <S%H7112><s%> it into wires <S%H6616><s%>, to work <S%H6213><s%> it in the blue <S%H8504><s%>, and in the purple <S%H713><s%>, and in the scarlet <S%H8144><s%>, and in the fine linen <S%H8336><s%>, the work <S%H4639><s%> of the skilful workman <S%H2803><s%>.
They made <S%H6213><s%> shoulder-pieces <S%H3802><s%> for it <S%H2266><s%>, joined together; at the two <S%H8147><s%> ends <S%H7098><s%> was it joined together <S%H2266><s%>.

And the skilfully woven band <S%H2805><s%>, that was upon it <S%H642><s%>, wherewith to gird it on <S%H4639><s%>, was of the same piece and like the work thereof <S%H2091><s%>; of gold, of blue <S%H8504><s%>, and purple <S%H713><s%>, and scarlet <S%H8144><s%>, and fine twined <S%H7806><s%> linen <S%H8336><s%>; as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

And they wrought <S%H6213><s%> the onyx <S%H7718><s%> stones <S%H68><s%>, inclosed <S%H4142><s%> in settings <S%H4865><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>, graven <S%H6605><s%> with the engravings <S%H6605><s%> of a signet <S%H2368><s%>, according to the names <S%H8034><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And he put <S%H7760><s%> them on the shoulder-pieces <S%H3802><s%> of the ephod <S%H646><s%>, to be stones <S%H68><s%> of memorial <S%H2146><s%> for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

And he made <S%H6213><s%> the breastplate <S%H2833><s%>, the work <S%H4639><s%> of the skilful <S%H2803><s%> workman <S%H4639><s%>, like the work of the ephod <S%H646><s%>; of gold <S%H2091><s%>, of blue <S%H8504><s%>, and purple <S%H713><s%>, and scarlet <S%H8144><s%>, and fine twined <S%H7806><s%> linen <S%H8336><s%>.

It was foursquare <S%H7251><s%>; they made <S%H6213><s%> the breastplate <S%H2833><s%> double <S%H3717><s%>: a span <S%H2239><s%> was the length <S%H753><s%> thereof <S%H2239><s%>, and a span the breadth <S%H7341><s%> thereof <S%H3717><s%>, being double.

And they set <S%H4390><s%> in it four <S%H702><s%> rows <S%H2905><s%> of stones <S%H68><s%>. A row <S%H2905><s%> of sardius <S%H124><s%>, topaz <S%H6357><s%>, and carbuncle <S%H1304><s%> was the first <S%H259><s%> row <S%H2905><s%>;
and the second <S%H8145><s%> row <S%H2905><s%>, an emerald <S%H5306><s%>, a sapphire <S%H5601><s%>, and a diamond <S%H3095><s%>;
and the third <S%H7992><s%> row <S%H2905><s%>, a jacinth <S%H3958><s%>, an agate <S%H7618><s%>, and an amethyst <S%H306><s%>;

and the fourth <S%H7243><s%> row <S%H2905><s%>, a beryl <S%H8658><s%>, an onyx <S%H7718><s%>, and a jaspar <S%H3471><s%>: they were inclosed <S%H4142><s%> in inclosings <S%H4396><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> in their settings <S%H4865><s%>.

And the stones <S%H68><s%> were according to the names <S%H8034><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, twelve <S%H8147><s%>, according to their names <S%H8034><s%>; like the engravings <S%H6603><s%> of a signet <S%H2368><s%>, every one <S%H376><s%> according to his name <S%H8034><s%>, for the twelve <S%H8147><s%> tribes <S%H7626><s%>.
And they made <S%H6213><s%> upon the breastplate <S%H2833><s%> chains <S%H8333><s%> like cords <S%H1383><s%>, of wreathen <S%H5688><s%> work <S%H4639><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%>.

And they made <S%H6213><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> settings <S%H4865><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>, and two <S%H8147><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> on the two <S%H8147><s%> ends <S%H7098><s%> of the breastplate <S%H2833><s%>.

And they put <S%H5414><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> wreathen chains <S%H5688><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> in the two <S%H8147><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> at the ends <S%H7098><s%> of the breastplate <S%H2833><s%>.

And the other two <S%H8147><s%> ends <S%H7098><s%> of the two <S%H8147><s%> wreathen <S%H5688><s%> chains <S%H5688><s%> they put <S%H5414><s%> on the two <S%H8147><s%> settings <S%H4865><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> them on the shoulder-pieces <S%H3802><s%> of the ephod <S%H646><s%>, in the <S%H4136><s%> forepart thereof <S%H6440><s%>.

And they made <S%H6213><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>, and put <S%H7760><s%> them upon the two <S%H8147><s%> ends <S%H7098><s%> of the breastplate <S%H2833><s%>, upon the edge <S%H8193><s%> thereof <S%H5676><s%>, which was toward the side of the ephod <S%H646><s%> inward <S%H1004><s%>.

And they made <S%H6213><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> them on the two <S%H8147><s%> shoulder-pieces <S%H3802><s%> of the ephod <S%H646><s%> underneath <S%H4295><s%>, in <S%H4136><s%> the forepart <S%H6440><s%> thereof <S%H5980><s%>, close by the coupling <S%H4225><s%> thereof <S%H4605><s%>, above the skilfully woven band <S%H2805><s%> of the ephod <S%H646><s%>.

And they did bind <S%H7405><s%> the breastplate <S%H2833><s%> by the rings <S%H2885><s%> thereof unto the rings <S%H2885><s%> of the ephod <S%H646><s%> with a lace <S%H6616><s%> of blue <S%H8504><s%>, that it might be upon the skilfully woven band <S%H2805><s%> of the ephod <S%H646><s%>, and that the breastplate <S%H2833><s%> might not be loosed <S%H2118><s%> from the ephod <S%H646><s%>; as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.
And he made <S%H6213><s%> the robe <S%H4598><s%> of the ephod <S%H646><s%> of woven <S%H707><s%> work <S%H4639><s%>, all <S%H3632><s%> of blue <S%H8504><s%>;

and the hole <S%H6310><s%> of the robe <S%H4598><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> thereof <S%H6310><s%>, as the hole of a coat <S%H8473><s%> of mail <S%H8193><s%>, with a binding round about <S%H5439><s%> the hole <S%H6310><s%> of it <S%H7167><s%>, that it should not be rent.

And they made <S%H6213><s%> upon the skirts <S%H7757><s%> of the robe <S%H4598><s%> pomegranates <S%H7416><s%> of blue <S%H8504><s%>, and purple <S%H713><s%>, and scarlet <S%H8144><s%>, and twined linen <S%H7806><s%>.

And they made <S%H6213><s%> bells <S%H6472><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> the bells <S%H6472><s%> between <S%H8432><s%> the pomegranates <S%H7416><s%> upon the skirts <S%H7757><s%> of the robe <S%H4598><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, between <S%H8432><s%> the pomegranates <S%H7416><s%>;

a bell <S%H6472><s%> and a pomegranate <S%H7416><s%>, a bell <S%H6472><s%> and a pomegranate <S%H7416><s%>, upon the skirts <S%H7757><s%> of the robe <S%H4598><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, to minister <S%H8334><s%> in <S%H3068><s%>; as Jehovah commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.
And they made <S%H6213><s%> the coats <S%H3801><s%> of fine linen <S%H8336><s%> of woven <S%H707><s%> work <S%H4639><s%> for Aaron <S%H175><s%>, and for his sons <S%H1121><s%>,

and the mitre <S%H4701><s%> of fine linen <S%H8336><s%>, and the goodly <S%H6287><s%> head-tires <S%H4021><s%> of fine linen <S%H8336><s%>, and the linen <S%H8336><s%> breeches <S%H4370><s%> of fine twined <S%H7806><s%> linen <S%H8336><s%>,

and the girdle <S%H73><s%> of fine twined <S%H7806><s%> linen <S%H8336><s%>, and blue <S%H8504><s%>, and purple <S%H713><s%>, and scarlet <S%H8144><s%>, the work of the embroiderer <S%H7551><s%>; as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

And they made <S%H6213><s%> the plate <S%H6731><s%> of the holy <S%H6944><s%> crown <S%H5145><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%>, and wrote <S%H3789><s%> upon it a writing <S%H4385><s%>, like the engravings <S%H6603><s%> of a signet <S%H2368><s%>, HOLY <S%H6944><s%> TO JEHOVAH <S%H3068><s%>.

And they tied <S%H5414><s%> unto it a lace <S%H6616><s%> of blue <S%H8504><s%>, to fasten <S%H5414><s%> it upon the mitre <S%H4701><s%> above <S%H4605><s%>; as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

Thus was finished <S%H3615><s%> all the work <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the tent <S%H4908><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>: and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> according to all that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>; so did they <S%H6213><s%>.

And they brought <S%H935><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, the Tent <S%H168><s%>, and all its furniture <S%H3627><s%>, its clasps <S%H7165><s%>, its boards <S%H7175><s%>, it bars <S%H1280><s%>, and its pillars <S%H5982><s%>, and it sockets <S%H134><s%>;

and the covering <S%H4372><s%> of rams <S%H352><s%>' skins <S%H5785><s%> dyed red <S%H119><s%>, and the covering <S%H4372><s%> of <S%H8476><s%> sealskins <S%H5785><s%>, and the veil <S%H6532><s%> of the screen <S%H4539><s%>;
the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%>, and the staves <S%H905><s%> thereof <S%H3727><s%>, and the mercy-seat;
the table <S%H7979><s%>, all the vessels <S%H3627><s%> thereof <S%H6440><s%>, and the showbread;

the pure <S%H2889><s%> candlestick <S%H4501><s%>, the lamps <S%H5216><s%> thereof <S%H5216><s%>, even the lamps to be set in order <S%H4634><s%>, and all the vessels <S%H3627><s%> thereof <S%H8081><s%>, and the oil for the light <S%H3974><s%>;

and the golden <S%H2091><s%> altar <S%H4196><s%>, and the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%>, and the sweet <S%H5561><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%>, and the screen <S%H4539><s%> for the door <S%H6607><s%> of the Tent <S%H168><s%>;

the brazen <S%H5178><s%> altar <S%H4196><s%>, and its grating <S%H4345><s%> of brass <S%H5178><s%>, its staves <S%H905><s%>, and all its vessels <S%H3627><s%>, the laver <S%H3595><s%> and its base <S%H3653><s%>;

the hangings <S%H7050><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%>, its pillars <S%H5982><s%>, and its sockets <S%H134><s%>, and the screen <S%H4539><s%> for the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%>, the cords <S%H4340><s%> thereof <S%H3489><s%>, and the pins thereof <S%H3627><s%>, and all the instruments of the service <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, for the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>;

the finely wrought <S%H8278><s%> garments <S%H899><s%> for ministering <S%H8334><s%> in the holy <S%H6944><s%> place <S%H6944><s%>, and the holy garments <S%H899><s%> for Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>, and the garments <S%H899><s%> of his sons <S%H1121><s%>, to minister in the priest <S%H3547><s%>'s office.
According to all that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>, so the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> all the work <S%H5656><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> all <S%H3651><s%> the work <S%H4399><s%>, and <S%H6213><s%>, behold, they had done it <S%H3068><s%>; as Jehovah had commanded <S%H6680><s%>, even so had they done <S%H6213><s%> it <S%H4872><s%>: and Moses blessed them <S%H1288><s%>.
